item.title: Software and operating system changes - update 1
item.description: This is the first update about our progress migrating operating systems on JASMIN from CentOS7 to Rocky Linux 9 as announced previously here.

item.title: Software and operating system updates coming soon to JASMIN
item.description: Moving to Rocky Linux 9   For the past few weeks and months we have been preparing for a change of operating system version on JASMIN.
